channel.title: Where is the SAML authentication SP metadata path
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I am using self-host mode redash, I want to access my CAS with SAML2.0, but I can't find the sp metadata path
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: latest * Browser/OS: macOS Monterey * How did you install Redash: pip

item.title: Where is the SAML authentication SP metadata path
item.dc:creator: DSigmund
item.description:
I am also searching for a metadata path

Read full topic
